content.text: Match ends, Stoke City 1, Chelsea 0.
Second Half ends, Stoke City 1, Chelsea 0.
Attempt missed. Willian (Chelsea) right footed shot from the right side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Nemanja Matic.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Ryan Shawcross.
Foul by Geoff Cameron (Stoke City).
Eden Hazard (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt saved. Oscar (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Eden Hazard.
Glen Johnson (Stoke City) is shown the yellow card.
Attempt missed. Loïc Remy (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Diego Costa.
Attempt missed. Jonathan Walters (Stoke City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Mame Biram Diouf.
Substitution, Stoke City. Mame Biram Diouf replaces Xherdan Shaqiri.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Glen Johnson.
